name: Charmeleon

evolution.description: Charmeleon can evolve into Charizard at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Flame Pokémon. Tough fights could excite this Pokémon. When excited, it may breathe out bluish-white flames.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: Damage rolls for this Pokémon get an additional +2 during harsh sunlight.
